system.usedWith: Any Plasma, Melta, Las, Bolt, SP, Flame. No Heavy except Stubber/Bolter/Flamer
system.damageOrEffect:
Multiply weapon clip size by 5x and is linked to backpack. If weapon jams only use one clip's worth of ammo and don't need to reload.
Weapon can't be reloaded during combat.
